#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
 
  void check(long n,long m)
  {
    long p,count=0,i;
    bool prime[m+1];
    memset(prime, true, sizeof(prime));
 
    for ( p=2; p*p<=m; p++)
    {
        // If prime[p] is not changed, then it is a prime
        if (prime[p] == true)
        {
            // Update all multiples of p
            for (i=p*2; i<=m; i += p)
                prime[i] = false;
        }
    }
 
    // Count all prime numbers
    for (p=n; p<=m; p++)
       if (prime[p])
          count++;
          
          cout<<count<<endl;
}

int main()
{
    long n,m,t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
    cin>>n>>m;
    check(n,m);
    }
    return 0;
}
